Name: MuGen - The Music Generator
About the game: MuGen - Music Generator Using MuGen you can create original music in seconds. Get inspired, unleash your creativity, or just simply generate music for your next game or youtube video. MuGen has been developed through many years, and is based on real world music theory used by professionals. MuGen uses guided randomization and AI to generate MIDI music based on your input parameters. MIDI is a very portable format and is the industry standard. That means it can be imported into nearly any music software out there like DAW's for further refinement, like adding real world instruments and mixing/mastering. Features Unlimited albums Unlimited songs per album Random album and song names Listen to your creation immediately Creates music in a Portable MIDI format suitable for importing into other programs for refinement Lots of customization Key, tempo, number of bards per chord, number of chords, chord lengths Scales and modes (Major/Minor, Dorian, Phrygian, Lydian, Mixolydian, Locrian) Customizable your verse, chorus, bridge and solo with their own key progressions, switching between major/minor or relative major/minor Create different song types like POP and EDM Use different song structures like verse/chorus, verse/chorus/bridge, buildup... Song parameters to customize the tone, sound, feel and mood of your songs Randomize instruments or choose instrument per channel Randomize drums or choose your favorites Chord based or scale based melodies Utilize Sus2/Sus4, Add9, 7th chords Chord staggering Embelllishments like passing notes, complete/double neighbor notes, octave attacks Add FX and PAD tracks for EMD style music ...and more!
